title: Effect of solid-state fermentation with Pleurotus ostreatus on the protein content and other nutritional components of de-seeded carob fruits
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4FB00173G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shahab Iqbal, Özge Tirpanalan-Staben, Knut Franke
Carob pulp is a currently underutilized by-product of locust been gum production. It is dense in several valuable nutritional components such as carbohydrates, dietary fiber, minerals and some bioactive substances....
